item.description:
Join the WBOA for Connections & Cocktails. Our speaker this month is  Christine Southworth, RN on "Stress Less for Business Success." Using mindfulness as a portable tool to reduce stress, increase creativity and focus …..for women.
Some benefits you may expect to see in implementing stress management techniques include: • Improvement of immune system & overall health • Improvement in decision making & creativity • Improvement of mood, memory & concentration • Reduction of muscle tension & pain Come relax, learn and play!
We'll also have our signature After 5 cocktail in non-alcoholic and high-test versions, a new seasonal cocktail to try, plenty of tasty appetizers, and raffle prizes! Plus, we will also have a special Early Bird RSVP raffle prize. If you RSVP and pay via MeetUp by November 5, you will be entered for a surprise raffle prize.

Christine Southworth, RN is a holistic nurse educator specializing in stress management combined with expressive art and play. Through her business, Southworth Wellness, LLC, she facilitates fun, creative and interactive stress management workshops for individuals, groups & businesses to decrease stress, improve health, productivity and quality of life.

Christine is known for her down-to-earth, practical and calming presence. The knowledge that she brings will appeal to your common sense – yet many adults have neglected to the point of forgetting how to provide for one's own self-care and relaxation "The time to relax is when you don’t have time for it.”- Sydney Harris

 

Our After 5 Event Sponsors:

Sue Gorman, Team Leader, Jockey P2P

Stylish versatility and luxurious comfort with a collection of clothing woman LOVE to live in!
(413) 478-2506

http://www.myjockeyp2p.com/web/suegorman

Angela Lowe, Owner and Consultant

It’s All About Accessories has some amazing pieces that will allow women to coordinate their outfits and wear the latest in fashion accessories (scarves, jewelry, handbags, belts, sunglasses and hats). They will make them feel empowered and feel beautiful every day. Feeling confident and happy about how you look is important. Whether you are going to work, going out for the evening or to a special event, IAAA can assist you with the goal of “completing your look In Style”.
(413) 221-1472

www.itsallaboutaccessories.net


Marie Jablonski

WBOA member, Attorney Marie T. Jablonski provides legal services throughout Western Mass including but not limited to:

  • Family law & Mediation
  • Real Estate
  • Estate Planning
  • Geriatric Care Management
  • Social Security Disability
  • Small Business
  • Representing individuals in Probate and District Court
Marie offers a free initial consultation by phone, or in person. She is happy to make nursing home visits, hospital visits, even good old fashion house calls.
Call (413)205-2912 or visit her website http://www.attyjablonski.com
item.name: WBOA After Five - Connections & Cocktails
